extendedInfo.description: InDrive is a unique application that combines car mode functionality with an advanced trip computer and deep Poweramp integration. With one-touch access to the most useful features on your phone, this app is your perfect driving companion!*** This is a free 30-day trial version. In order to continue using the app after this period, you will need to purchase the InDrive Unlocker.InDrive makes it very easy to launch your favorite applications, directly dial numbers, view your trip information and control music playback*. It will auto launch when placed in a compatible car dock. If you don't have a physical car dock, InDrive provides an option to force your phone into car mode, which will allow the app to override the Home button. Please note that for this feature to work properly on Android 2.x and higher, you have to set InDrive as the default car dock app. To do this, simply check the "Enable car mode" option in the settings and follow the instructions. This only needs to be done once.NOTE FOR ANDROID 4.2.x USERS: Unfortunately, it appears that Google has removed dock home support in Android 4.2. Pressing the Home button will now return you to the launcher screen instead of InDrive or other car home app of choice. If you want this feature back, please vote for the following issue: http://code.google.com/p/android/issues/detail?id=39662* The music screen is designed to work in conjunction with Poweramp. Without Poweramp installed, you will only be able to do very basic controls such as switching to the next song in the default Android music player. Support for other media players is not guaranteed.Trip computer features:* Street address* Speedometer (mph, km/h or knots)* Heading* Battery level* Weather (Fahrenheit or Celsius)* Odometer* Time traveled (total / driving / stopped)* Average speed (total / driving)* Max speed* Elevation* Time of dayStartup options:â¢ Enable car mode (Force the phone into car mode like it had been placed in the car dock)â¢ Check GPS status (Open the location settings screen if GPS is disabled)â¢ Turn on Bluetoothâ¢ Disable Wi-Fiâ¢ Set media volume (Does not affect the ringtone volume)â¢ Set screen brightness (Will override the automatic brightness setting if necessary)Other settings:â¢ Keep screen on (Prevent the screen from locking while the app is running)â¢ Disable auto rotation (Turn this option on when driving on bumpy roads)â¢ Turn on speakerphoneâ¢ Mute notification soundsâ¢ Vibrate on pressâ¢ Minimum accuracyâ¢ Filter the GPS speedâ¢ Run in the backgroundâ¢ Enable track loggingâ¢ Exit on undockKNOWN ISSUES: If you are experiencing a problem where the app randomly closes without any errors, try disabling integration with Poweramp in the app settings. This is a confirmed problem in Poweramp that unfortunately affects InDrive due to the link between two applications. It should be fixed in the next Poweramp update.BATTERY USAGE: This app is very battery intensive when used with the default settings. When not connected to a power source, please uncheck the "Keep screen on" option in the app settings.NOTE ON PERMISSIONS: InDrive requires access to several system features, such as GPS, Bluetooth, Wi-Fi, audio settings, and also to the SD card in order to write temporary log files and map images (these will be deleted on uninstall). It also requires a permission to directly call phone numbers for the shortcuts screen to work properly.If you have any questions or comments, feel free to post them on our blog or open a support ticket here: http://support.codesector.com/

reviews.title: Very smooth Car dock software
reviews.comment: Very snappy, clean and sleek Car Home app. The PowerAMP integration is great as is the dimming/brightening depending on sunrise/sunset.
reviews.author: Laurie Street

reviews.title: Great app but ...
reviews.comment: ... could be much greater with automatic speaker on when I make a call also (until now speaker switch on just if I receive a call )
reviews.author: Andrea Naselli

reviews.title: Great app, but not compatible with Nexus 7
reviews.comment: Of the various car home apps I\'ve been testing I like this one the best. It has the most fluid ui and cleanest looks. Only marked it as a 3 to try and get some support for Nexus 7 as that is what will be integrated into my dash, not the cell phone. Once that is added rating will be increased, and full version purchased. Thanks for the great work keep it up.
reviews.author: Bryce Stringham

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Great potential. But Exit car home shortcut disappearing randomly. need  the gps panel to be redesigned so that it can be simpler  eg just speedometer with nice big numbers. Need option to disable the gps panel & gps usage from within the app itself as apps and music sufficient for me car does the rest. Would like option to remove blue bar with names of windows;its not necessary information. Bugs: media volume change goes to zero on exit, please+gesture to chg plylst Shrtct to powrmp plylst cant use homebu.
reviews.author: James Cooke

reviews.title: Almost Perfect
reviews.comment: I like the mileage tracker and PowerAmp integration. However, the app shortcut screens aren\'t all that great, which is the main reason I use a car home app. It doesn\'t have the ability to continuously scroll through screens which makes it cumbersome to get from screen 5 back to 1 while driving. Also, it needs a button on the side to scroll through screens because when swiping, I keep triggering apps that I don\'t want to open. Therefore, I will have to pass on this one.
reviews.author: Jim James

reviews.title: Almost perfect
reviews.comment: Great Poweramp integration and solid car dock, but 1 star down because night mode needs a colour tint as its still too bright and it sometimes stays running after close which kills your battery in no time.
reviews.author: Danny Monaghan

reviews.title: Great potential
reviews.comment: On the page for app shortcuts the vertical scrolling is hard to activate, which isn\'t ideal for a driving app. Would also like to see the ability to disable the music page, or integration with play music. So close to perfect for a great looking app.
reviews.author: Troy Henderson

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: Really Helps
reviews.author: Edna Trevino

reviews.title: Useful
reviews.comment: Excellent app
reviews.author: shero wattoo

reviews.title: Good app, improving each update
reviews.comment: I\'m using it to replace Car Dock Home v3 which had become very laggy on my phone. No such issue with InDrive, while it extends the dock functionality to include speed and distance stats (v useful with the new Background mode). Very helpful dev, and I see this app improving further in the near future. One moan is that swiping up/down to change shortcut screens is very temperamental.
reviews.author: Stephen Gunn

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.comment: A nice app...
reviews.author: Ajin Pisharody

reviews.title: It\'s what I needed but...
reviews.comment: Direct dial still force closes. I wish I could voice Commands.
reviews.author: Jonathan Ibarra

reviews.comment: Wish it was free. Good app though
reviews.author: Graham Dearn

reviews.title: Untested in car
reviews.comment: As title but appears very good and functional
reviews.author: Emma Maude

reviews.comment: I can listen to my music while driving and I it tell your speed limit
reviews.author: Franklin Scott

reviews.comment: Still new to using it. A lot more to learn.
reviews.author: Ruth Liew

reviews.title: Great apps !
reviews.comment: Works perfectly ! Simple n useful....... thanks !
reviews.author: Papa Cho

reviews.comment: If this remains, this is the only auto and or transportation tracking app for a small business would need.
reviews.author: Robert Haynes

reviews.title: Yay
reviews.comment: Yay
reviews.author: David Schlosstein
